name: Local food & wine tasting tour
highlight: Lunch and wine-tasting at a local winery established in 1933 that won 3x Decanter gold.

pickup.rules: Pick-up possible only within 5km from the meeting point. Please confirm pick-up with us after you make the booking.

description: A description of an experience comes here.
cancellationPolicy: Fully refundable up to 24h before start

otherNotes: This is a tour of a working winery
